member.name: T:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt
member.summary: Extension methods for writing bits to primitive buffers.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Inject(System.UInt64,System.UInt32@,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Inject (write/serialize) x bits of source value into a target primitive (the buffer) starting at bitposition.
member.param: Value to write.
Target of write.
Auto-incremented write position. Writing will begin at this position in the buffer, and this value will have bitcount added to it.
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to target buffer.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Inject(System.UInt64,System.UInt64@,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Inject (write/serialize) x bits of source value into a target primitive (the buffer) starting at bitposition.
member.param: Value to write.
Target of write.
Auto-incremented write position. Writing will begin at this position in the buffer, and this value will have bitcount added to it.
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to target buffer.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Extract(System.UInt64,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Extract (read/deserialize) a value from a source primitive (the buffer) by reading x bits starting at the bitposition, and return the reconstructed value.
member.param: Source primitive buffer to read from.
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to return value.
Auto-incremented reference to the src read bit pointer. Extraction starts at this point in src.
member.returns: Downcast this ulong return value to the desired type.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Extract(System.UInt64,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extract (read/deserialize) a value from a source primitive (the buffer) by reading x bits starting at the bitposition, and return the reconstructed value.
member.param: Source primitive buffer to read from.
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to return value.
Auto-incremented reference to the src read bit pointer. Extraction starts at this point in src.
member.returns: Downcast this ulong return value to the desired type.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Extract(System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extract and return bits from src.
member.param: Source primitive.
How many lower order bits to read.
member.returns: Cast the return value to the desired type.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Extract(System.UInt32,System.Int32@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extract (read/deserialize) a value from a source primitive (the buffer) by reading x bits starting at the bitposition, and return the reconstructed value.
member.param: Source primitive buffer to read from.
Number of lower order bits to copy from source to return value.
Auto-incremented reference to the src read bit pointer. Extraction starts at this point in src.
member.returns: Cast this uint return value to the desired type.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Extract(System.UInt32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extract and return bits from src.
member.param: Source primitive.
How many lower order bits to read.
member.returns: Cast the return value to the desired type.

member.summary: Extract and return bits from src.

How many lower order bits to read.
member.returns: Cast the return value to the desired type.

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.Inject(System.Single,System.UInt64@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Inject (serialize/write) a float into a primitive buffer at the bitposition. No compression occurs, this is a full 32bit write.
member.param: Float to compress and write.
Target buffer for write.
Auto-incremented read position for the buffer (in bits)

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.ExtractFloat(System.UInt64,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Extract a float from a bitpacked primitive(src) starting at bitposition.
member.param: Auto-incremented read position for the buffer (in bits)

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.InjectAsHalfFloat(System.Single,System.UInt64@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Inject (serialize/write) a compressed float into a primitive buffer at the bitposition.
member.param: Float to compress and write.
Target buffer for write.
Auto-incremented read position for the buffer (in bits)

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.InjectAsHalfFloat(System.Single,System.UInt32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Inject (serialize/write) a compressed float into a primitive buffer at the bitposition.
member.param: Float to compress and write.
Target buffer for write.
Auto-incremented read position for the buffer (in bits)

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.ExtractHalfFloat(System.UInt64,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Extract a float from a bitpacked primitive(src) starting at bitposition.
member.param: Source buffer to extract from.
Auto-incremented read position for the buffer (in bits)

member.name: M:emotitron.Compression.PrimitiveSerializeExt.ExtractHalfFloat(System.UInt32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Extract a float from a bitpacked primitive(src) starting at bitposition.
member.param: Source buffer to extract from.
Auto-incremented read position for the buffer (in bits)
